value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.15621v1", "title": "Regularization of elliptic multiple zeta values", "summary": "In this paper, we show that regularized elliptic multiple zeta values are\ngiven by polynomials in elliptic multiple zeta values with admissible indices\nand special ones whose indices consist of 0 and 1.", "main_category": "math.NT", "categories": "math.NT", "published": "2025-04-22T06:24:48Z"}
